1.panel_description: Display a list of open-air restaurants in San Diego.

1.handles: Searches for open-air restaurants in San Diego.

input_vars.name: restaurant_search_query
input_vars.description: Query to find open-air restaurants in San Diego with details such as name, rating, and reviews.
input_vars.value: List open-air restaurants in San Diego with details such as name, rating, and reviews.

output_vars.name: open_air_restaurants
output_vars.description: List of open-air restaurants in San Diego.
